description: Submits a request to perform the following operations:   Add or delete DnsRecords configurations   Update the TTL setting for existing DnsRecords configurations   Add, update, or delete HealthCheckConfig for a specified service   You must specify all DnsRecords configurations (and, optionally, HealthCheckConfig) that you want to appear in the updated service. Any current configurations that don't appear in an UpdateService request are deleted. When you update the TTL setting for a service, Amazon Route 53 also updates the corresponding settings in all the records and health checks that were created by using the specified service.
